name: The Interview [XXX Complete Minigame]
description:
Plot:

You are the head of a fashion company, the girl in question is the ex of one of your old best friend.  She was treacherous with him, and they broke up years ago.
Today you get a request from this girl to get hired... she does not know that you are the head of the company... with so much power, will you now be able to avenge your friend?

If you like this game, support us on patreon.com/kravenar !
